# K6 / K10 Permissions and Scoring

## Permission Summary

The K6/K10 scales are free to use without formal permission; include copyright and citation when reproducing.

## Scoring Summary

- Use 0-4 coding (none=0 through all=4).
- K6 total range: 0-24
- K10 total range: 0-40

## Interpretation (General)

- Higher scores indicate greater distress.
- Use local or setting-specific cutoffs when available.

## Common Cutoffs

### K6

- Score â‰¥13 suggests a high likelihood of serious mental illness.

### K10

- 10-19: Likely well
- 20-24: Mild distress
- 25-29: Moderate distress
- 30-50: Severe distress
